data.message: What I would like is to be able to search wiyhin groups I belong to.  For instance a group that is classified and I want to find the posting of a certain item.  I would like to type the name of the article instead of having to scan back through dozens of postings to find it.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Rebecca. We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Hailey
Thank you for your reply.  I really hope you can do this.
